summary.description:
Identification of biomarkers and construction of a microRNA-mRNA regulatory network for ependymoma using integrated bioinformatics analysis.

a comprehensive atlas of predicted and validated miRNA-target interactions.

New version of miRWalk is online. Follow this link here .

Dweep, H et al. miRWalk - database: prediction of possible miRNA binding sites by "walking" the genes of 3 genomes, Journal of Biomedical Informatics, 44: 839-7 (2011). ( JBI PubMed ).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'GEO2R' (bio.tools/GEO2R), 'DEMs', 'EPN'
summary.name: miRWalk2.0
